00024 #ifndef _LINEARSOLVER_HPP_
00025 #define _LINEARSOLVER_HPP_

00028 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00029 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector.hpp>
00030 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/matrix.hpp>
00031 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/lu.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/triangular.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/vector_proxy.hpp>
00034 #include <boost/numeric/ublas/io.hpp>
00035 #include <stdexcept>

00037 #include <iostream>
00038 #include <iomanip>
00039 #include <math.h>
00040 
00041 #include "qr.hpp"
00042 
00043 namespace pwiz {
00044 namespace math {
00045 
00046 
00047 enum PWIZ_API_DECL LinearSolverType {LinearSolverType_LU, LinearSolverType_QR};
00048 
00049 
00050 template <LinearSolverType solver_type = LinearSolverType_LU>
00051 class LinearSolver;
00052 
00053 
00054 template<>
00055 class LinearSolver<LinearSolverType_LU>
00056 {
00057 public:
00058 
00059     /// solve system of linear equations Ax = y using boost::ublas;
00060     /// note: extra copying inefficiencies for ease of client use 
00061     template<typename matrix_type, typename vector_type>
00062     vector_type solve(const matrix_type& A, 
00063                       const vector_type& y)
00064     {
00065         namespace ublas = boost::numeric::ublas;
00066 
00067         matrix_type A_factorized = A;
00068         ublas::permutation_matrix<size_t> pm(y.size());
00069 
00070         int singular = lu_factorize(A_factorized, pm);
00071         if (singular) throw std::runtime_error("[LinearSolver<LU>::solve()] A is singular.");
00072 
00073         vector_type result(y);
00074         lu_substitute(A_factorized, pm, result);
00075 
00076         return result;
00077     }
00078 }; 
00079 
00080 
00081 template<>
00082 class LinearSolver<LinearSolverType_QR>
00083 {
00084 public:
00085 
00086     /// solve system of linear equations Ax = y using boost::ublas;
00087     /// note: extra copying inefficiencies for ease of client use 
00088     template<typename matrix_type, typename vector_type>
00089     vector_type solve(const matrix_type& A, const vector_type& y)
00090     {
00091         typedef typename matrix_type::size_type size_type;
00092         typedef typename matrix_type::value_type value_type;
00093         
00094         namespace ublas = boost::numeric::ublas;
00095 
00096         matrix_type Q(A.size1(), A.size2()), R(A.size1(), A.size2());
00097 
00098         qr (A, Q, R);
00099 
00100         vector_type b = prod(trans(Q), y);
00101 
00102         vector_type result;
00103         if (R.size1() > R.size2())
00104         {
00105             size_type min = (R.size1() < R.size2() ? R.size1() : R.size2());
00106 
00107             result = ublas::solve(subrange(R, 0, min, 0, min),
00108                                   subrange(b, 0, min),
00109                                   ublas::upper_tag());
00110         }
00111         else
00112         {
00113             result = ublas::solve(R, b, ublas::upper_tag());
00114         }
00115         return result;
00116     }
00117 };
